ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.detailedForecast: Rain before 11pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 11pm and 2am, then rain. Cloudy, with a low around 37. Northeast wind 15 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between 1 and 2 inches possible.
